item.theurgy.essentia_gauge.tooltip: Look at a machine to display it's Essentia storage. Right-Click and hold to display the chunk's diffused Essentia.
jei.theurgy.ingredient.prima_materia_cry: View the §6Hermetica§r for more information. Place a Pure Crystal in a chunk with 1000 diffused Essentia of each type. The crystal will create Prima Materia Crystals on adjacent non-floor (ceiling, wall) blocks. To diffuse Essentia into a chunk, dissolve items in the Crucible, over time the dissolved Essentia will diffuse.
